IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: LOCATED IN PLYMOUTH, NEW HAMPSHIRE, HOLDERNESS SCHOOL IS A TRADITIONAL INDEPENDENT CO-ED BOARDING SCHOOL WITH AN ENROLLMENT OF 278. SERVING GRADES 9-12, HOLDERNESS SCHOOL PROVIDES A CHALLENGING COLLEGE PREPARATORY CURRICULUM AND SPECIAL PROGRAMS IN ACADEMICS, THE ARTS, THE OUTDOORS, STUDENT LEADERSHIP, AND ATHLETICS INCLUDING WINTER SPORTS. HOLDERNESS SCHOOL FOSTERS EQUALLY THE RESOURCES OF THE MIND, BODY, AND SPIRIT IN THE CREATION OF A CARING COMMUNITY, INSPIRING ALL TO WORK FOR THE BETTERMENT OF HUMANKIND AND GOD'S CREATION.
IRS990.MissionDesc: HOLDERNESS SCHOOL FOSTERS EQUALLY THE RESOURCES OF THE MIND, BODY, AND SPIRIT IN THE CREATION OF A CARING COMMUNITY, INSPIRING ALL TO WORK FOR THE BETTERMENT OF HUMANKIND AND GOD'S CREATION.
IRS990.Desc: PRIVATE SECONDARY SCHOOL WHICH SERVICED 278 STUDENTS IN GRADES 9-12 DURING THE LAST YEAR, TEACHING SUBJECTS USUALLY TAUGHT IN PUBLIC SCHOOLS. DURING THE SUMMER MONTHS THE SCHOOL HOSTS SCIENTIFIC CONFERENCES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PERMANENTLY RESTRICTED NET ASSETS ARE COMPRISED OF THE ORIGINAL VALUE OF GIFTS AND ALL SUBSEQUENT GIFTS DONATED TO THE PERMANENT ENDOWMENT TO BE USED PRIMARILY FOR SCHOLARSHIPS, FACULTY ENRICHMENT, AND PLANT MAINTENANCE. TERM AND BOARD DESIGNATED ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE TO BE USED FOR VARIOUS PURPOSES SIMILAR TO THOSE OF THE PERMANENT ENDOWMENT FUNDS.

THE SCHOOL HAS ADOPTED THE PROVISIONS OF FASB ASC 740, ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES (FASB ASC 740). ACCORDINGLY, MANAGEMENT HAS EVALUATED THE SCHOOL'S TAX POSITIONS AND CONCLUDED THE SCHOOL HAD MAINTAINED ITS TAX-EXEMPT STATUS, DOES NOT HAVE ANY SIGNIFICANT UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME AND HAD TAKEN NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT REQUIRE ADJUSTMENT OR DISCLOSURE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. WITH FEW EXCEPTIONS, THE SCHOOL IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO INCOME TAX EXAMINATIONS BY THE U.S. FEDERAL OR STATE TAX AUTHORITIES FOR TAX YEARS BEFORE 2012.
INCREASE IN VALUE OF SPLIT-INTEREST AGREEMENTS 63,307.
ASSISTANCE TO INDIV (SHOWN NET AGAINST PROGRAM SVC REVENUE ON FINANCIAL REP) 3,462,713. BAD DEBT EXPENSE 265.
ASSISTANCE TO INDIV (SHOWN NET AGAINST PROGRAM SVC REVENUE ON FINANCIAL REP) 3,462,713.
THE SCHOOL INCLUDES THIS IN ITS SCHOOL HANDBOOK. IN ADDITION, THE SCHOOL PUBLISHES THIS INFORMATION IN NEWSPAPERS THROUGH THE ASSOCIATION OF INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS OF NEW ENGLAND.

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.NonCashAssistanceDesc: FINANCIAL AID ASSISTANCE TO ATTEND HOLDERNESS SCHOOL

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FINANCIAL AID ASSISTANCE THAT IS AWARDED TO INDIVIDUAL STUDENTS WHO ATTEND THE SCHOOL IS APPLIED DIRECTLY TO EACH STUDENT'S TUITION ACCOUNT, THUS USED FOR TUITION PURPOSES ONLY.
ON CAMPUS HOUSING IS PROVIDED FOR THE HEAD OF SCHOOL AND BUSINESS MANAGER AND OTHER FACULTY MEMBERS WHO ALL HAVE IN-HOUSE RESIDENT RESPONSIBILITIES AND FOR THE CONVENIENCE OF HOLDERNESS SCHOOL.

BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.RelationshipDescriptionTxt: WIFE OF R. PHILLIP PECK, HEAD OF SCHOOL

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FINAL DRAFT OF THE SCHOOL'S FORM 990 IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE FULL BOARD AT THEIR OCTOBER BOARD MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE IS ANNUALLY DISTRIBUTED TO ALL TRUSTEES, OFFICERS, AND KEY EMPLOYEES OF THE SCHOOL IN THE FALL. THESE ARE REVIEWED BY THE AUDIT AND FINANCE COMMITTEE AT THEIR OCTOBER MEETING AND ANY CONFLICTS WHICH MIGHT BE CONSIDERED SERIOUS ARE BROUGHT TO THE BOARD'S ATTENTION AT ITS NEXT MEETING FOR RESOLUTION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD HAS DIRECTED THE HEAD OF SCHOOL TO HIRE AND COMPENSATE THE SENIOR MANAGEMENT BASED ON INDUSTRY BENCHMARK & PERFORMANCE EVALUATION AND REPORT BACK TO THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE THE COMPENSATION LEVELS OF OFFICERS, KEY AND HIGHLY COMPENSATED EMPLOYEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THESE DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST FROM THE SCHOOL'S BUSINESS OFFICE.
CHANGE IN VALUE OF SPLIT-INTEREST AGREEMENT 63,307. BAD DEBT EXPENSE -265.
AUDIT COMMITTEE OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT PROCESS REMAINS UNCHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
